title.rendered: STEDI 76MM TO 81MM TUBE CLAMP BULL BAR MOUNTING BRACKETS | SILVER

content.rendered:
These silver bullbar bracket can be used for effortless mounting of our range of HID Spot Light and Light Bars

OVERVIEW

The STEDI Tube Clamp Bull Bar Brackets offer a stable mounting platform for bullbars that are not fitted with tabs for UHF Antennas and LED lights. Made from cast aluminium with stainless steel fasteners keeping it strong yet light weight as well as a polyester UV stable powder coat to reduce fade.

VERSATILE

With the ability to mount light bars on the top or alternatively flipped upside down hanging from the tube, the tube clamps give you as much adjustability as you need to angle your lights from any position. Also a popular choice for mounting UHF Antennas.

WORK LIGHTS

Our Tube Clamps also have the ability to mount the majority of our LED Work lights. Compatible with LED Work Lights from as small as the 10w Mini up to as large as 60w Mining Spec.

DETAILS

76mm to 81mm (3 inches) diameter Silver Bull Bar brackets Made from High Quality Aluminium. These bulbar brackets can be used for effortless mounting of our range of HID Spot Light and Light Bars. Can also be used to mount the following;

  • Communications Antennas
  • Reversing Camera Systems
  • Driving Lights
  • LED Light Bar

3inches is the most common diameter on the thicker bull bar tubes and rear sports bars.

To measure whether these brackets are suitable for your application, please measure the circumference of your round bar and apply below formula; diameter = circumference / 3.14

Please ensure you carefully measure your bull bar to ensure correct fitment. We supply in the package 2 x rubber inserts which can pick up slack and is also recommend to prevent scratches on your applied surface.

We also have satin black finish, please check our other listings. We stock all the popular sizes 48-53mm, 60-65mm, 76-81mm

Price is for 2 brackets as shown in the pictures.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

MATERIAL Aluminium
WIDTH 76mm to 81mm

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 2 x 76mm to 81mm UHF Bull Bar Bracket
  • 2 x Rubber Inserts
  • 4 x Stainless M6 Bolts
  • 4 x Stainless Nuts
  • 4 x Flat Washers
  • 4 x Lock washers
  • Instruction Manual

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
